kw.name: Error Message Should Be
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Page should have contained text 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678)' but did not.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.status: Page should have contained text 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678)' but did not.

kw.arg: Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678)
kw.status: Page should have contained text 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678)' but did not.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

test.status: Page should have contained text 'Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678)' but did not.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
